text:
So #COVIDー19, #Asteroid2020 and #ASUU got me rapping No go dey do pass yourself.
Lyrics:My fellow Nigerians, my name is Marvelene &I want to rap.
#Chloroquine no be #vitamineC, Boost your #immunity not #toxicity in this #city.Azithromycin is no a sea through my sin. Stay safe https://t.co/rQ4lwQLqMM
